title: Jersey Cash 5 jackpot will be split 4 ways
body: Four lucky ticket holders will split Saturday’s $404,612   jackpot.Each ticket is worth $101,153 and matched the following numbers: , and . The XTRA number was .The tickets were bought at the following locations — one in Hudson County, two in Middlesex County and one in Morris County:No one hit Sunday’s jackpot, pushing Monday’s top prize to an estimated $158,000.The odds of a $1 ticket matching all five numbers are 1,221,759 to 1.Note to readers: if you purchase something through one of our affiliate links we may earn a commission.
